meanings: (고체가) melt, run, (얼음·눈 등이) thaw (out), (금속 등이) fuse
음식에 대해 It melts in your mouth.

meanings.meaning: a plate of toast oozing butter

vlive.korean: [7. 샤샤 하트 때문에 원스 마음 이미 초콜릿 아이스크림처럼 녹아내렸다던데 진짜인가요?] [7. I heard that SANA's heart made the hearts of ONCE melt like chocolate. Is that true?] View video TWICE : TMT | 트둥이들의 미션 임파서블!(feat.MBC가요대제전) 💖 TOO MUCH TWICE EP.02
vlive.english: [7. I heard that SANA's heart made the hearts of ONCE melt like chocolate. Is that true?]

vlive.korean: 근데 이런 거 다 안 녹아요? These don't melt? 듣기 View video TWICE : 모 생일🍑
아이스크림 안 녹아? Does the ice cream not melt? 듣기 View video GOT7 : GOT7(갓세븐) MONOGRAPH "Call My Name" EP.04
vlive.english: Does the ice cream not melt?

vlive.korean: 약이 더 뭔가... - 빨리 녹아? - 어, 빨리... It feels like the pill... - Would melt fast? - Yes. 듣기 View video TWICE : 쯔가 사줫어요...그래서 한번 해보고싶어서...ㅋㅋ
vlive.english: It feels like the pill... - Would melt fast? - Yes.

vlive.korean: 너무 많이 하면 녹아요 저 봤죠? If you do it too much, it's going to melt. You saw me, right? 듣기 View video VICTON : 앨리스 넘나 보고싶어서😍😭👏🏻
vlive.english: If you do it too much, it's going to melt. You saw me, right?

examples.korean: Eat your ice cream indoors, or it will desolidify soon in this hot weather. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 아이스크림을 실내에서 먹어라, 그렇지 않으면 이렇게 더운 날에 곧 녹아내릴 것이다. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
